query.mssql: create table {0} ([DocumentId] bigint NOT NULL, [TaskId] bigint, [ResponsibleId] bigint, [Responsible] nvarchar(max), [DepartmentId] bigint, [Department] nvarchar(max), [Total] int, [Nbt] int, [Filial] int, [InternalLetters] int, [Letters] int, [Others] int, [ReportSessionId] nvarchar(max) NOT NULL)

query.default: select * from litiko_DocflowReport temp where ReportSessionId = @ReportSessionId
